mapper.select: select a.id, a.dev_id devId, a.alarm_type alarmType, a.prec, a.alarm_level alarmLevel, DATE_FORMAT(a.alarm_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') alarmTime, a.alarm_addr alarmAddr, a.send_order_user sendOrderUser, a.confirm_user confirmUser, a.suggestion, a.principal, a.state, a.alarm_cacel_time alarmCancelTime, b.name orgName, c.name devName, d.name devTypeName, e.name sendName, e.phone from pdf_order a left join t_org b on a.alarm_addr = b.id left join t_device c on a.dev_id = c.id left join t_code d on c.dev_type = d.id and c.type_id = d.type_id left join sys_user e on a.send_order_user = e.id where a.id = #{id}

select * from (select concat(o.id) orgId, CONCAT(a.id) id, CONCAT(b.id) chId, b.ch_no chNo, DATE_FORMAT(max(a.real_time),'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') alarmTime, 0 alarmType,
tdd.`online`, d.name devTypeName, '设备离线' prec, po.id orderId, IFNULL(c.addr,'') deviceAddr, o.id alarmAddr, 1 alarmLevel, case when d.id in (131,178) then CONCAT(IFNULL(b.addr,''),b.name) ELSE CONCAT(IFNULL(c.addr,''),c.name) end devName, d.id typeId, u.name sendName, sys.user_id sendOrderUser, o.`name` orgName, CONCAT(c.id) devId, 1 alarmNumber, -1 state, 0 isDispatch from t_real_data a inner join t_channel b on a.id = b.id inner JOIN t_device c on c.id = b.dev_id left join t_device_detail tdd on tdd.id = c.id LEFT JOIN t_code d on d.id = c.dev_type and d.type_id = 1 left join t_code t on t.id = b.ch_type and t.type_id = b.type_id left join t_code_type tc on tc.id = t.type_id LEFT JOIN t_org o on c.org_id = o.id LEFT JOIN pdf_org pr on pr.t_org_id = o.id inner join sys_user_bureau sys on sys.bureau_id = pr.bureau_id left join sys_user u on u.id = sys.user_id left join pdf_order po on po.order_id = a.id where sys.user_id = #{userId} and tdd.online = 0
and tdd.online <0
GROUP BY c.id
union all
select concat(o.id) orgId, CONCAT(a.id) id, CONCAT(b.id) chId, b.ch_no chNo, DATE_FORMAT(max(a.occur_time),'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') alarmTime, 1 alarmType, 1 online, d.name devTypeName, CONCAT(b.name,'报警') prec, po.id orderId, IFNULL(c.addr,'') deviceAddr, o.id alarmAddr, a.alarm_level alarmLevel, case when d.id in (131,178) then CONCAT(IFNULL(b.addr,''),b.name) ELSE CONCAT(IFNULL(c.addr,''),c.name) end devName, d.id typeId, u.name sendName, sys.user_id sendOrderUser, o.`name` orgName, CONCAT(c.id) devId, alarmNumber, case when a.status >= 1 then 1 else 0 end state, case when po.state >= 2 then 1 else 0 end isDispatch from (select * ,COUNT(*) alarmNumber from (select * FROM t_alarm_log where status is null HAVING 1 ORDER BY occur_time desc ) j GROUP BY j.ch_id) a inner join t_channel b on a.ch_id = b.id inner JOIN t_device c on c.id = b.dev_id left join t_device_detail tdd on tdd.id = c.id LEFT JOIN t_code d on d.id = c.dev_type and d.type_id = 1 left join t_code t on t.id = b.ch_type and t.type_id = b.type_id left join t_code_type tc on tc.id = t.type_id LEFT JOIN t_org o on c.org_id = o.id LEFT JOIN pdf_org pr on pr.t_org_id = o.id inner join sys_user_bureau sys on sys.bureau_id = pr.bureau_id left join sys_user u on u.id = sys.user_id left join pdf_order po on po.order_id = a.id where sys.user_id = #{userId}
and tdd.online <0
GROUP BY b.id) m order by alarmTime desc

select CONCAT(a.id) id, CONCAT(b.id) chId, b.ch_no chNo, po.id orderId, DATE_FORMAT(max(a.occur_time),'%y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') alarmTime, case when tc.id = 2 then 0 else 1 end alarmType, tdd.`online`, d.name devTypeName, CONCAT(tc.type_name,'报警') prec, po.id sendId, o.id alarmAddr, a.alarm_level alarmLevel, case when d.id in (131,178) then CONCAT(IFNULL(b.addr,'')) ELSE CONCAT(IFNULL(c.addr,'')) end devName, d.id typeId, u.name sendName, sys.user_id sendOrderUser, o.`name` orgName, CONCAT(c.id) devId, alarmNumber, case when a.status >= 1 then 1 else 0 end state, case when po.state >= 2 then 1 else 0 end isDispatch from (select * ,COUNT(*) alarmNumber from (select * FROM t_alarm_log HAVING 1 ORDER BY occur_time desc ) j GROUP BY j.ch_id) a inner join t_channel b on a.ch_id = b.id inner JOIN t_device c on c.id = b.dev_id left join t_device_detail tdd on tdd.id = c.id LEFT JOIN t_code d on d.id = c.dev_type and d.type_id = 1 left join t_code t on t.id = b.ch_type and t.type_id = b.type_id left join t_code_type tc on tc.id = t.type_id LEFT JOIN t_org o on c.org_id = o.id LEFT JOIN pdf_org pr on pr.t_org_id = o.id inner join sys_user_bureau sys on sys.bureau_id = pr.bureau_id left join sys_user u on u.id = sys.user_id left join pdf_order po on po.order_id = a.id
and sys.user_id = #{userId}
and a.id = #{id}
and (o.parent_ids like concat('%',#{alarmAddr},'%') or o.id = #{alarmAddr})
and c.dev_type = #{devType} and c.type_id = 1
and c.name = #{devName}
and a.alarm_level = #{alarmLevel}
and tc.id = 2
and tc.id != 2
and a.occur_time >= DATE_FORMAT(#{alarmStartTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
and a.occur_time <= DATE_FORMAT(#{alarmEndTime},'%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59')
and a.status >= 1
and a.status is null
and a.status in (2,3)
and (a.status is null or a.status =1)
GROUP BY b.id order by a.occur_time DESC

select DATE_FORMAT(occur_time, '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') alarmTime, IFNULL(reason, '无') reason, a.id sendId from t_alarm_log o left join pdf_order a on o.id = a.order_id where o.ch_id = #{chId} order by occur_time desc

select id from t_org
and id = #{id}
and name like '%${name}%'
and type < 5
select id from t_org where (parent_ids like '%${id}%' or id = #{id}) and type = 5
mapper.insert:
insert into pdf_order
alarm_type,
alarm_time,
dev_id,
prec,
alarm_level,
alarm_addr,
principal,
suggestion,
send_order_user,
confirm_user,
alarm_source,
reason,
type_id,
order_id,
#{alarmType},
#{alarmTime},
#{devId},
#{prec},
#{alarmLevel},
#{alarmAddr},
#{principal},
#{suggestion},
#{sendOrderUser},
#{confirmUser},
#{alarmSource},
#{reason},
#{typeId},
#{orderId},
mapper.delete:
delete from pdf_order where id IN
#{item}
mapper.select:
SELECT concat(id) id,name,mobile phone from sys_user where id in
#{item}
mapper.update:
UPDATE pdf_order
state = #{state},
principal = #{principal},
send_order_user = #{sendOrderUser},
suggestion = #{suggestion},
reason = #{reason},
order_id = #{orderId},
main_type = #{mainType},
WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: select f.state state1, f.date, a.id, a.dev_id devId, a.alarm_type alarmType, a.prec, a.alarm_level alarmLevel, DATE_FORMAT(a.alarm_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') alarmTime, a.alarm_addr alarmAddr, a.send_order_user sendOrderUser, a.confirm_user confirmUser, a.suggestion, a.principal, a.state, a.alarm_cacel_time alarmCancelTime, b.name orgName, c.name devName, d.name devTypeName, e.name sendName, e.phone from pdf_order a left join t_org b on a.alarm_addr = b.id left join t_device c on a.dev_id = c.id left join t_code d on c.dev_type = d.id and c.type_id = d.type_id left join sys_user e on a.send_order_user = e.id LEFT JOIN pdf_order_recorder f on a.id = f.order_id where a.principal like '%${principal}%' and f.user_id = #{principal} and a.state !=5 and a.state = #{state} and (b.id = #{alarmAddr} or b.parent_ids like '%${alarmAddr}%') group by id order by a.alarm_time desc

select f.state state1, f.date, a.id, a.dev_id devId, a.alarm_type alarmType, a.prec, a.alarm_level alarmLevel, DATE_FORMAT(a.alarm_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') alarmTime, a.alarm_addr alarmAddr, a.send_order_user sendOrderUser, a.confirm_user confirmUser, a.suggestion, a.principal, a.state, a.alarm_cacel_time alarmCancelTime, b.name orgName, c.name devName, d.name devTypeName, e.name sendName, e.phone from pdf_order a left join t_org b on a.alarm_addr = b.id left join t_device c on a.dev_id = c.id left join t_code d on c.dev_type = d.id and c.type_id = d.type_id left join sys_user e on a.send_order_user = e.id LEFT JOIN pdf_order_recorder f on a.id = f.order_id where a.principal like '%${principal}%' and a.state = 2 and (b.id = #{alarmAddr} or b.parent_ids like '%${alarmAddr}%') group by id ORDER BY f.date desc

select a.id, a.dev_id devId, a.alarm_type alarmType, a.prec, a.alarm_level alarmLevel, DATE_FORMAT(a.alarm_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') alarmTime, a.alarm_addr alarmAddr, a.send_order_user sendOrderUser, a.confirm_user confirmUser, a.suggestion, a.principal, a.state, a.alarm_cacel_time alarmCancelTime, b.name orgName, c.name devName, d.name devTypeName, e.name sendName, e.phone from pdf_order a left join t_org b on a.alarm_addr = b.id left join t_device c on a.dev_id = c.id left join t_code d on c.dev_type = d.id and c.type_id = d.type_id left join sys_user e on a.send_order_user = e.id where a.principal like '%${principal}%' and a.state = 5 and (b.id = #{alarmAddr} or b.parent_ids like '%${alarmAddr}%') group by id ORDER BY a.alarm_cacel_time desc
select CONCAT(a.id) id, a.name, IFNULL(a.addr, '') addr from t_device a LEFT JOIN t_org b on a.org_id = b.id where (b.id = #{id} or b.parent_ids like '%${id}%') and a.dev_type = #{type}

select a.id, a.name from sys_user a left join t_org b on a.org_id = b.id left join sys_user_role c on a.id = c.user_id left join sys_role d on c.role_id = d.id where b.id = #{orgId} or b.parent_ids like '%${orgId}%' GROUP BY id

select CONCAT(u.id) id, u.name, mobile phone, case when ur.role_id = 233993942926888975 then 0 ELSE 1 end type from sys_user u inner join sys_user_role ur on ur.user_id = u.id where ur.role_id in (233993942926888975, 5)

select concat(d.id) type, CONCAT(c.id) principal, c.contacts username, d.name companyName, c.telephone from pdf_order a inner join t_org b on b.id = a.alarm_addr INNER JOIN pdf_maintenance_detail c on c.org_parent_id = b.parent_id inner join pdf_maintenance d on d.id = c.maintenance_id where a.id = #{id}

select DATE_FORMAT(a.occur_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') time,CONCAT(a.id) id from t_alarm_log a inner join t_alarm_videorecord av on av.alarm_log_id = a.id where a.ch_id = #{chId} ORDER BY a.occur_time desc

select video_ch_id videoChId, alarm_log_id alarmLogId, store_server_id storeServerId, IFNULL(c.addr, '') addr, c.name, record_status recordStatus, store_path StorePath, play_url playUrl from t_alarm_videorecord v left join t_channel c on c.id = v.video_ch_id where alarm_log_id = #{alarmLogId}
